t:type.name: SameCode
t:type.t:description: Represents a SameCode that is used by the National Weather Service (NWS) to identify weather stations.

t:attribute.name: code
t:attribute.description: The stringified version of numerical code with leading zeroes

t:attribute.name: county
t:attribute.description: The geographical county as represented in U.S. Postal Codes

t:attribute.name: state
t:attribute.description: The full state or territory name

t:attribute.name: stateCode
t:attribute.description: The 2 or 3 character abbreviation that represents a state
